attributes.action: To increase the British production industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that everything we buy today is made in areas such as Asia?
If you look on your clothes, footballs, toy cars, gaming software, lawn mowers or automobiles, the vast majority are produced overseas. 
Why is it we cannot produce items for our selves like we did 30, 40, 50, 60 years ago?
If the government took steps to increase our industry then it could only benefit the economy and increase employment for our British citizens.
We should be looking to produce energy renewable goods and move ahead of other countries in this sector, like we have militarily.
There are some good areas of British production, but we could and should do much better.
